Text: Hmm a FR release what group released this one and/or what crack do you used for this upload?
how to change to english ? dont like the words in the game...

@sthlm080808 : For an english game, open "system.cfg" who is in "C:\...\Electronic Arts\Crytek\Crysis 2" and change "g_language = french" by "g_language = english".
Then save and restart the game !
thx 4 sharing this game, can you please also seed the giant citizen kabuto please?,, iam stuck with 99,8% thank you very much
